name: Balls!🤬🍆
description:
🤬🍆 - Get your ball to the end of each level... 😴😵😱🤯🤪

This is my first public game, and attempt at integrating Steamworks in a game. 🤓


The game is about controlling a ball from start to finish on different levels, getting past the obstacles. 🥳🤑!!1

Good Luck - Have Fun!

This is an Early Access release, the game will progress along side of the development.😲

Features (Current✔️ and comming❌):
  • Straightforward gameplay and physics ✔️
  • Steam Achievements ✔️
  • Steam Leaderboards ❌
  • Steam Inventory:
    • Trophies ✔️
    • Ball Skins ❌

Caution:🤓😮
  • This game is still very early stage - And might therefore have both bugs and glitches.🤧🤒
  • Do NOT buy unless you are okay with that!👨‍🏫
